alert.note: Alert for Grande Ronde Valley; Wallowa County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 3:09AM PST until December 31 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches in the Grande Ronde Valley and 4 to 6 inches in the Wallowa Valley. Gusty winds may lead to blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Grande Ronde Valley and Wallowa County. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.
